org.daisy.dotify.hyphenator

Class HyphenatorFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.dotify.hyphenator.HyphenatorFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.daisy.dotify.common.text.StringFilter

    public class HyphenatorFilter
extends Object
implements org.daisy.dotify.common.text.StringFilter
    Provides a hyphenating string filter. This filter will hyphenate the filter input using the supplied hyphenator.

    • Method Detail

      • getBeginLimit

        public int getBeginLimit()
        Gets the begin limit. In other words, the number of unbreakable characters at the beginning of each word.
        Returns:
        returns the begin limit

      • setBeginLimit

        Sets the begin limit. In other words, the number of unbreakable characters at the beginning of each word.
